name: UpdateGlobalWebhook
description:
Update a GitHub enterprise global webhook.

Use this tool to modify settings of a global webhook in GitHub Enterprise. Parameters not provided will default or be removed if no default exists.

parameters.name: webhook_identifier
parameters.description: The unique integer identifier for the webhook that needs to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the hook.

parameters.name: payload_media_type
parameters.description: The media type for payload serialization. Supported values: `json`, `form`. Default is `form`.

value_schema.description: The media type used to serialize the payloads. Supported values include `json` and `form`. The default is `form`.

parameters.name: verify_ssl_certificate
parameters.description: Determines SSL certificate verification for payload delivery. Use '0' for verification and '1' to skip (not recommended). Default is '0'.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the SSL certificate of the host for `url` will be verified when delivering payloads. Supported values include `0` (verification is performed) and `1` (verification is not performed). The default is `0`. **We strongly recommend not setting this to `1` as you are subject to man-in-the-middle and other attacks.**

parameters.name: hmac_secret_key
parameters.description: Secret key for generating HMAC hex digest value in `X-Hub-Signature` header.

value_schema.description: If provided, the `secret` will be used as the `key` to generate the HMAC hex digest value in the [`X-Hub-Signature`](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/webhooks/event-payloads/#delivery-headers) header.

parameters.name: payload_delivery_url
parameters.description: The URL where webhook payloads will be delivered for processing.

value_schema.description: The URL to which the payloads will be delivered.

parameters.name: webhook_trigger_events
parameters.description: The events that trigger the global webhook. Can include 'user', 'organization'. Defaults to both if not specified.

value_schema.description: The [events](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/webhooks/event-payloads) that trigger this webhook. A global webhook can be triggered by `user` and `organization` events. Default: `user` and `organization`.

parameters.name: send_notifications_on_trigger
parameters.description: Set to `true` to send notifications when the webhook is triggered.

value_schema.description: Determines if notifications are sent when the webhook is triggered. Set to `true` to send notifications.
